attributes.additional_details:
I think bringing WWE Wrestlemania, the main Pay Per View to England would be very beneficial to the country.

The income the country could generate from this event would very high as alot of people come from all around the world to watch it live.

Currently the event is held every year in USA and each state/city that hosts it makes alot of income in that single month from travellers/tourists for the show.

I think this should be thought about seriously
